summary: "A Clockwork Orange" is a 1971 movie by Stanley Kubrick, based on Anthony Burgess's book. It's set in a future Britain and follows Alex, a violent teenage leader of a gang. The film shows his crimes and how he's later tried to be "fixed" by the government using a controversial method. Alex narrates the story in a unique slang called Nadsat. The movie was controversial due to its graphic violence and was banned in some countries. Over time, it gained a cult following and is now considered an important film.
title: A Clockwork Orange (film)
